Mobiles.Name: servant
Mobiles.Long_Description: Someone lights the candles of the room.
Mobiles.Description: The servant looks in your direction though it has no face.

Mobiles.Name: chef
Mobiles.Description:
The chef grins, "Another UNWELCOMED guest.
The house shall dine like royalty tonight!"

Mobiles.Name: woman guest
Mobiles.Long_Description: A woman rises from the bed at your intrusion.
Mobiles.Description:
This woman is well put together and in EXCELLENT shape.
As a matter of fact she is in such great shape you have your doubts
about over powering her!

Mobiles.Name: servant
Mobiles.Long_Description: Someone lights the candles in the room.
Mobiles.Description:
The faceless servant looks in your direction then wails a warning to the
household that an UNWELCOMED guest has come!

Mobiles.Name: man guest
Mobiles.Long_Description: A man stands near the bed protecting its occupant.
Mobiles.Description:
This man is not the least bit embarressed about standing before you naked,
as a matter of fact he seems rather happy about your intrusion as he cracks
his knuckles and prepares to break your bones!

Mobiles.Name: guardian
Mobiles.Long_Description: The guardian of stone stands before the doors.
Mobiles.Description:
The guardian stands here imobile.
She carries no expression, she cares not wether you live or die.

Mobiles.Name: starfire healer
Mobiles.Long_Description: Starfire rests here enjoying the quiet and the warmth of the fire.
Mobiles.Description:
This man dresses in black and silver.
How appropiate for this place, dont ya think?

Mobiles.Name: tiger
Mobiles.Long_Description: The tiger lies casually near the bed waiting for his mistress.
Mobiles.Description:
This tiger is by no means compariable to any other, mainly due to size.
His pale blue eyes follow your every move about his mistress's room.
You notice a colar about his neck.

Objects.Name: cleaver
Objects.Description: A wicked cleaver rests here.

Objects.Name: lighter
Objects.Description: A lighter for candles rests here.

Objects.Name: key
Objects.Description: A strange key is here.

Objects.Name: hat
Objects.Description: A funny hat lays here in a heap.

Objects.Name: coat
Objects.Description: A coat of sorts lies here, covered in blood.

Objects.Name: pants
Objects.Description: A pair of bloody pants lie here.

Objects.Name: shoes
Objects.Short_Description: a pair of bloody tennis shoes
Objects.Description: A pair of bloody shoes lie here.

Objects.Name: cloak
Objects.Description: A cloak the color of darkness lies here.

Objects.Name: chain
Objects.Description: A chain made of rare stones lies here.

Objects.Name: necklace
Objects.Description: A rare necklace lies here discarded.

Objects.Name: talisman
Objects.Description: A strange talisman lies here.

Objects.Name: ring
Objects.Description: A ring with the head of a ram lies here.

Objects.Name: helmet
Objects.Description: A marble helmet lies here.

Objects.Name: amulet ebony silver veined marble
Objects.Description: A marble amulet rests here.

Objects.Name: plate
Objects.Description: A marble breastplate lies here.

Objects.Name: bands armbands silver
Objects.Description: A set of marble armbands lies here.

Objects.Name: gauntlets
Objects.Description: A pair of marble gauntlets lie here.

Objects.Name: plates
Objects.Description: A pair of marble legplates lie here.

Objects.Name: boots
Objects.Description: A pair of marble boots lie discarded here.

Objects.Name: aura
Objects.Description: A strange aura hangs here in mid air.

Objects.Name: bola
Objects.Short_Description: ebony silver veined marble and chain bola
Objects.Description: A bola of marble and chain lies here.

Objects.Name: robe robes
Objects.Short_Description: a black and silver mage robe
Objects.Description: A robe lies heaped up on the ground.

Objects.Name: collar
Objects.Short_Description: a collar of opals and emeralds
Objects.Description: A collar of opals and emeralds lies here, the words RA ingraved at its center.

Rooms.Name: Mudroom
Rooms.Description: You enter a spacious entranceway. Oak floors and trim, the place has a decieving aura of home. Enter this secret place at your own risk.

Rooms.Name: Hallway
Rooms.Description: Well your ambitious bravado brings you to a set of stairs that lead up to the second floor. There is an archway here that leads into a strange sitting room.

Rooms.Name: Sittingroom
Rooms.Description: Silence beats against the shimmering walls here. The fireplace ignites as you enter and the walls seem to fade in and out of existance. The only thing appearing semi stable are the throw pillows scattered about the entire floor.

Rooms.Name: Upstairs Hallway
Rooms.Description: This hallway is deceptive. Sometimes its end seems close at hand and other times within a blink of an eye it appears to stretch on for eternity.

Rooms.Name: Hallway
Rooms.Description: You appear to be near one of the more normal settings of this place. However I wouldnt be so sure just yet. The living room lays through an archway while the kitchen lies hidden behind a door.

Rooms.Name: Living room
Rooms.Description: This room is dimly lit by a hundred candles and shadows reach every corner. Have you ever known fear?

Rooms.Name: Kitchen
Rooms.Description: Maybe it wasnt such a good idea to enter here. There is a very large butcher block against the far wall where the chef is preparing the last UNWELCOMED guest.

Rooms.Name: Upstairs Hallway
Rooms.Description: The Hallway seems to lengthen out and leave your tail farrrrrrrr behind. However there is a door nearby if you care to try it.

Rooms.Name: Guest Room
Rooms.Description: The HUGE bed floats above the plush carpet while the drapes rustle gently from a breeze you cant feel.

Rooms.Name: Upstairs Hallway
Rooms.Description: The hallway stretches far beyond your imagining but there is a portrait here to distract you, of the mistress who lives here. Long flowing dark auburn hair and piercing emerald eyes look daringly into yours as her translucent cape flows about her nubine, naked body.

Rooms.Name: Upstairs Hallway
Rooms.Description: You travel forever and have come to the master bedroom. Its huge double doors are closed. A mural of vampire hunts from long ago lie carved deep in their surface. You can almost feel the angony and despair of the main vampire being staked.

Rooms.Name: Master Bedroom
Rooms.Description: This room is cast in candlelight and sets the pale lace glowing like the full moon. The fireplace is lit and welcoming, its warmth penetrating even the coolest soul. Out of the corner of your eye you catch a glimpse of deep auburn hair disappearing behind a curtain.

Rooms.Name: Balcony
Rooms.Description: You are on a balcony of air with no support in sight. Before your very eyes a pair of emerald green eyes appear, almost smiling into yours.

Rooms.Name: Upstairs Hallway
Rooms.Description: The hallway reaches out and in the distance you can see another set of large double doors. It would appear to be the local residence office. Another portrait marks the wall, of the green eyed woman and by her side stands a man dark, with piercing violet, amber eyes.

Rooms.Name: Upstairs Hallway
Rooms.Description: The portraits along this stretch of hallway distracts you from the distance you must travel to the office. Here is a picture of the man dark. His piercing violet, amber eyes seem to bore into yours as his silver hair rustles on a silent breeze. His order of dress betrays his perfected talents in war.

Rooms.Name: Upstairs Hallway
Rooms.Description: Your gaze runs across the potrait here and your mind screams for you to get the heck out of here. A man/demon constructed of shadows stands in a background of flames and destruction. He wears a sneer of pleasure as all around him scream in pain. The man/demon comes from the darkest pits of hell!

Rooms.Name: Upstairs Hallway
Rooms.Description: With a shudder of relief you now stand before the great doors to the residence office. The doors stand 10ft tall and each is 6ft wide, however will you get inside? Might be a good idea to request an audience.

Rooms.Name: Kree's Office
Rooms.Description: A large fireplace ignites to life at your entrance and your gaze falls upon the simple comforts of the room, from the sitting pillows and low tables to the single portrait above the fireplace. The man is hard to see or define, strangly enough he always seems to be changing each time you blink your eyes. The only thing constant is the twisted smile that passes his lips.

Resets.Comment: a faceless servant to Living room
a naked woman to Guest Room
a faceless servant to Living room
a naked man to Guest Room
a guardian of stone to Mudroom
Starfire, healer of the unwelcomed to Sittingroom
a white siberian tiger to Master Bedroom
a guardian of stone to Kree's Office
a white siberian tiger to Kree's Office
